line_1: Ah! foolish I, and trembling thus awoke;
line_2: In holy bonds: — but here away I broke,

line_1: AMANDA, from her flow'ry Bed, awoke;
line_2: Sad was her Heart, and discompos'd her Look;
An' as he, helpless, met the stroke,

line_1: Ere from the sudden shock astonished she awoke.
line_2: Smiling maliciously as thus he spoke,

line_1: Ere from the sudden shock astonished she awoke.
line_2: Then swiftly rushing from the den he broke,

line_1: At which my dormant fancy first awoke,
line_2: Thy love of tale and story was the stroke

line_1: The prince address'd his host; the God awoke,
line_2: And leaping from his couch, thus kindly spoke.
